description: Andrew Nisbet will be sent to a UK mental health facility for the killing of Pamela Nisbet.
title: Jersey man who stabbed his mother sentenced to mental health facility
title_page: Jersey man who stabbed his mother sentenced to mental health facility - BBC News
maintext: Det Insp Christina Maclennan, head of Jersey police's Serious Crime Unit, said: "This is an extremely tragic case that has significantly impacted both the family and the community and our thoughts are foremost with Pamela's family."
